Package ZuulBad

Enum Room

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Room>
ZuulBad.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Room>, java.lang.constant.Constable
enum Room
extends java.lang.Enum<Room>
An instance of this class represents one location in the scenery of the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. There is an instance of the class Items, which is used to store items contained in the room. There are some special features of a room. E.g. a room can be a able to teleport the player.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Birk, Katerina Matysova, Sarah Engelmayer

  • Field Details

    • description

      private java.lang.String description
      The description of the room.

    • exits

      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Room> exits
      Store exits of the rooms. For each exit put a String (describing the direction in which the exit is e.g. "north") as its key and the room behind this exit as its value.

    • npc

      private NonPlayerCharacter npc
      A non player character (npc) in the room.

    • itemList

      private Items itemList
      A lit of items which are in the room.

    • roomEntries

      private int roomEntries
      The number how often a room is entered.

    • locked

      private boolean locked
      A room condition describing if the room is locked.

    • teleports

      private boolean teleports
      A room condition describing if the room is a teleporter room. 'True' if the room is a teleporter room, 'false' otherwise.

    • monster

      private boolean monster
      A room condition describing if a room contains monsters. 'True' if the room has a monster, 'false' otherwise.

    • finalroom

      private boolean finalroom
      A room condition describing if the room is the final room. 'True' if the room is the final room, 'false' otherwise.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      private Room​(java.lang.String description)
      Create a room described by its description (as a string). Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard". Initialize the variables exits, itelList, roomentries, locked, teleports, monster, finalroom.
      Parameters:
      description - The room's description.

    • getExit

      public Room getExit​(java.lang.String direction)
      Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction". If there is no room in that direction, return null.
      Parameters:
      direction - The exit's direction.
      Returns:
      The room in the given direction.

    • getNpcMessage

      public java.lang.String getNpcMessage()
      Get a message from the non player character of the room. This is what the npc says before he receives the item he/she/it wants.
      Returns:
      The message given by the NPC of the room.
